alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 29 at 9:21AM MST until November 29 at 9:45AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 945 AM MST. * At 920 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Walsenburg to near La Veta, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Walsenburg. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
